title: Hydrothermal synthesis of modified lignin-based carbon dots derived from biomass waste for fluorescence determination of valsartan
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19969-19982
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02398F, Paper

Fatemah Aldakhil, Nawal A. Alarfaj, Salma A. Al-Tamimi, Maha F. El-Tohamy
Phosphorous and chlorine co-doped carbon dots (PClCDs) based on lignin extracted from date seeds have been synthesized and used in the field of drug detection.
